original_text: And the angel of the Lord went out and struck down 185,000 in the camp of the Assyrians. And when people arose early in the morning, behold, these were all dead bodies.
korean_text: 여호와의 사자가 나가서 앗수르 진중에서 십팔만 오천인을 쳤으므로 아침에 일찍이 일어나 본즉 시체뿐이라

sentences.original_text: And the angel of the Lord went out
and struck down 185,000 in the camp of the Assyrians.
sentences.korean_translation: 앗수르 진영에서 십팔만 오천 명을 쳤으니

sentences.original_text: And when people arose early in the morning,
